divs: Sighting Details5 miles north of port st lucie fl sevice plaza on fl turnpike i was on north side it was heading south paralell to road.when i fist saw it hovering changing colors brite white,blue,red,red yellow orange like about 2 miles ahead flashing colors for 4 min then lights dimed it moved south very slow 5 mph passed by me no sound disk shape 75 to 100 yards wide dark color rotating dimed lights on bottom. if you want to hear the hole event you may call me.
